item.title: Argentina’s Pro-Bitcoin Candidate Javier Milei Pledges to Shut Central Bank
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
Javier Milei, the leading presidential candidate in Argentina and a strong Bitcoin advocate, has proposed a drastic economic plan to address the nation’s economic issues. As per a Bloomberg report, the radical libertarian has pledged to close the nation’s central bank, dramatically reduce spending, and dollarize the $640 billion economy if he is elected. Sweeping

The post Argentina’s Pro-Bitcoin Candidate Javier Milei Pledges to Shut Central Bank appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Solana (SOL) Now Among the Most Liquid Altcoins on Coinbase: Kaiko
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
Solana (SOL) has surged to become one of the most liquid altcoins on the leading crypto exchange Coinbase, according to recent findings by market intelligence firm Kaiko. The token boasts over $3 million in liquidity, overshadowing prominent altcoins like DOGE, XRP, and Matic. Despite the recent 6% drop in Solana price amid market-wide pessimism, SOL’s

item.title: FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX and CEO John J. Ray III agree to settle with Genesis entities for $176 million. FTX creditors are disappointed with the plan and asking the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors of FTX (UCC) to object to the settlement agreement as Alameda paid billions of FTX customer funds to Genesis in 2022.

The post FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX and CEO John J. Ray III agree to settle with Genesis entities for $176 million. FTX creditors are disappointed with the plan and asking the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors of FTX (UCC) to object to the settlement agreement as Alameda paid billions of FTX customer funds to Genesis in 2022.

The post FTX Seeks Settlement Agreement With Genesis For Just $176 Million appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Shiba Inu Nosedives 8% After Shibarium Mainnet Launch, Here’s Why
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Shiba Inu is sinking further below $0.00001, contrary to investor expectations of a rally brewing following the launch of the anticipated Ethereum Layer 2 protocol, Shibarium. Down 8%, SHIB is trading at $0.00000908 on Thursday, with the possibility of revisiting lower support levels at $0.0000075 and $0.0000065, respectively. Shibarium Mainnet Launch Fails to Trigger Shiba

item.title: Nigerian NNPC Signs $3 Billion Deal to Boost Failing Naira
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Nigerian state energy firm, the Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) has inked a strategic deal with Cairo-based Afreximbank to secure a $3 billion emergency loan to help stabilize the Naira. According to local media outlet Nigerian Tribune, this move follows the free fall of the Naira against the dollar.  Naira Devaluation Triggers Fuel Price Surge

The post Nigerian NNPC Signs $3 Billion Deal to Boost Failing Naira appeared first on CoinGape.

item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
